chat_history.message:
Hello,

The package of the order 40914241 could not be delivered because the address is wrong or incomplete.

Please send us the good address + the name of your customer + phone number or ask your customer to reschedule the new delivery with the carrier.

Thank you.


Valérie DECAMPS

Hello ecomobile,

The customer's address is correct:
Lucas Todisco
30 Avenue de Valence
Résidence la rollandiere Bat c3
38360 Sassenage
France
06 16 02 36 11
lucas.nuovo.38@gmail.com

Thank you for understanding,
Marijo Georgelluca from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

I have relayed this information to our logistics partner. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Hello ecomobile,

The customer informed that he has still not received his order. Please, do the necessary.

Thank you for understanding,
Marijo Georgelluca from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer. Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD.

Regards,
AS
